# `lattice` - `xpose4`
## `lattice` example
```{r}
xyplot(DV ~ TIME | DOSE, data = data, type  = 'o',
groups = ID, strip = strip.custom(strip.names = TRUE),
xlab = 'Time (hr)', ylab = 'DV', as.table = TRUE)
```


## `xpose4` example
### Load NONMEM data
```{r}
xpdb <- xpose.data(runno = '001')
```

### Change `xpose4` variable definitions
```{r}
change.xvardef(xpdb,'ranpar') <- paste0('ETA',1:6)
```

### Access `xpose4` data
```{r}
data <- xpdb@Data
```
